main event: Witnesses reported seeing a bright, pulsing light in the sky over Bergenfield, New Jersey on June 16, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses observed the object for about 3 minutes before it moved off erratically,The object appeared as a tall light with no discernible shape,The sighting was confirmed by three witnesses,The sky was reported to be clear during the observation,The object was described as having a red, pulsating light.
